watch_stylesheet.description: Watch for css stylesheet changes and reload with new changes.

watch_config.description: Watch for config.yaml changes and reload with new changes.

debug.description: Enable this for more detailed logs to help with debuging.

enabled.title: enabled
enabled.description: Whether or not to enable the bar.

screens.title: screens
screens.description: The screens you want the bar to show on. `['DELL P2419H (1)']` for example

class_name.title: class_name
class_name.description: The css class name for the main bar.

position.title: position
position.description: The position of the bar on the screen.

center.title: center
center.description: Whether to center the bar or not.

enabled.title: enabled
enabled.description: Whether or not to enable blur effects.

acrylic.title: acrylic
acrylic.description: Acrylic effect will be applied to the bar

dark_mode.title: dark_mode
dark_mode.description: Dark mode will add more shadow to the bar

border_color.title: border_color
border_color.description: `None`, `System` or HEX color (this option is related to round_corners=true)

always_on_top.title: always_on_top
always_on_top.description: Whether or not to always keep the bar on top of everyting else on screen.

width.title: width
width.description: The width of the bar on the screen.

height.title: height
height.description: The height of the bar on the screen.

top.title: top
top.description: The top padding for the bar.

left.title: left
left.description: The left padding for the bar.

bottom.title: bottom
bottom.description: The bottom padding for the bar.

right.title: right
right.description: The right padding for the bar.

left.title: left
left.description: The widgets to put in the left of the bar.

center.title: center
center.description: The widgets to put in the center of the bar.

right.title: right
right.description: The widgets to put in the right of the bar.

widget_label.title: widget label
widget_label.description: The label text for the widget.

widget_label_alt.title: widget label alt
widget_label_alt.description: The alternative label text for the widget.

widget_update_interval_secs.title: widget update interval
widget_update_interval_secs.description: The amount of seconds between updates for the widget.

widget_update_interval_milisecond.title: widget update interval
widget_update_interval_milisecond.description: The amount of miliseconds between updates for the widget.

widget_callback_on_left.title: widget callback on left
widget_callback_on_left.description: The callback to run on left click.

widget_callback_on_middle.title: widget callback on middle
widget_callback_on_middle.description: The callback to run on middle click.

widget_callback_on_right.title: widget callback on right
widget_callback_on_right.description: The callback to run on right click.

thumbnail_corner_radius.title: thumbnail_corner_radius
thumbnail_corner_radius.description: thumbnail corner_radius. Set to 0 for square corners

locale.title: locale
locale.description: Langugae for date, you can set your own, example 'en_EN', or 'fr_FR'.

timezones.title: timezones
timezones.description: Looking up time zone info from registry, example '[America/Montreal]'.

update_interval.description: Update interval should be a multiple of 1000

label.description: The label text for the widget. Special values included here are: '{icon}' '{temp_c}' '{min_temp_c}' '{max_temp_c}' '{temp_f}' '{min_temp_f}' '{max_temp_f}' '{location}' '{humidity}' '{is_day}' '{icon}' '{icon_class}' '{conditions}'

api_key.title: api_key
api_key.description: REPLACE THIS. Your api key. Get your free API key from https://www.weatherapi.com/

update_interval.description: Update interval in seconds, Min 600 seconds

location.title: location
location.description: location. You can use 'USA Los Angeles 90006' {COUNTRY CITY ZIP_CODE}, or just city.

button_row.title: button_row
button_row.description: button_row. Number of buttons in row, min 1 max 5

app_list.title: app_list

token.title: token
token.description: github token. GitHub Personal access tokens (classic) https://github.com/settings/tokens

max_notification.title: max_notification
max_notification.description: max_notification. Max number of notification displaying in menu max: 50

only_unread.title: only_unread
only_unread.description: only_unread. Show only unread or all notifications

max_field_size.title: max_field_size
max_field_size.description: max_field_size. Max characters in title before truncation.

update_interval.description: Check for new notification in seconds

image_path.title: image_path
image_path.description: image_path. Path to folder with images. example 'C:\Users\xxx\Images'

update_interval.description: If change_automatically is true, update interval in seconds
